query: What types of accounting courses are offered?
golden_set: The accounting courses offered include topics in accounting fundamentals, accounting software, and personal finance, investments, and taxes.

query: Can you provide details about the 'Certificate in Accounting Studies' course?
golden_set: The 'Certificate in Accounting Studies' course costs $2195 and is offered by the JER Group. You can find more details [here](https://und.coursecatalog.com/coursedetail.aspx?courseId=2716).

query: What is included in the 'Complete Enrolled Agent (EA) Review Program and Exam Prep'?
golden_set: The 'Complete Enrolled Agent (EA) Review Program and Exam Prep' costs $1799 and is designed to help participants prepare for the Enrolled Agent exam. More information can be found [here](https://und.coursecatalog.com/coursedetail.aspx?courseId=2826).

query: Are there any courses focused on accounting software?
golden_set: Yes, there is a 'QuickBooks Bundle (2012 to 2019)' course available for $199, which is also offered by the JER Group. Details can be found [here](https://und.coursecatalog.com/coursedetail.aspx?courseId=2761).

query: What are the costs associated with the accounting courses?
golden_set: The costs for the accounting courses vary, with prices ranging from $199 for the QuickBooks Bundle to $2749 for the 'Certificate in Accounting and Bookkeeping Studies (including Voucher)'.

query: Where can I find the Office of Extended Learning?
golden_set: The Office of Extended Learning is located in O'Kelly Hall Room 300 at 221 Centennial Dr Stop 9021, Grand Forks, ND 58202-9021. You can contact them at 701.777.0488 or email [UND.courses@UND.edu](mailto:UND.courses@UND.edu).

query: What is the duration of the accounting courses?
golden_set: The duration of the accounting courses may vary depending on the specific course. It is best to check the course details on the respective links for precise duration information.

query: Is there a course that includes a voucher?
golden_set: Yes, both the 'Certificate in Accounting Studies (including Voucher)' and the 'Certificate in Accounting and Bookkeeping Studies (including Voucher)' courses include a voucher. The costs are $2349 and $2749, respectively.

query: Who is the partner for these accounting courses?
golden_set: All the accounting courses listed are offered by the JER Group.

query: What topics are covered in the 'All Access IRS CE Library' course?
golden_set: The 'All Access IRS CE Library' course covers various topics related to IRS continuing education, including tax regulations, compliance, and best practices for tax preparation. It is priced at $499.

query: Are these courses suitable for beginners?
golden_set: Yes, many of these accounting courses are designed for individuals at various skill levels, including beginners who want to build a solid foundation in accounting principles.

query: What resources are provided with the courses?
golden_set: Resources provided with the courses may include course materials, access to online platforms, and sometimes additional tools or vouchers for related software.

query: How can I enroll in these courses?
golden_set: You can enroll in these courses by clicking on the course titles provided in the course listings, which will take you to their respective pages for registration.

query: Is financial aid available for these courses?
golden_set: Information regarding financial aid for these courses is not provided. It is recommended to contact the Office of Extended Learning for inquiries about financial assistance options.

query: Do the courses offer any certification upon completion?
golden_set: Yes, many of the accounting courses offer certificates upon completion, which can enhance your resume and professional qualifications.

query: What courses are available for event planners on campus?
golden_set: Event planners on campus can benefit from resources such as Conference, Camp & Event Services, marketing support, catering services, audiovisual equipment rental, and access to venue space and facilities.

query: Can you list some personal and professional development courses?
golden_set: Personal and professional development courses include topics like Effective Emails, Memos, and Letters, Customer Service Learning Bundle, and the Certificate in Business Communications.

query: What certifications can I obtain related to Dietary Managers?
golden_set: You can obtain certifications such as Nutrition and Foodservice Professional Training Programs, CDM Exam Success Courses, and Continuing Education Courses for Dietary Managers.

query: Are there any courses focused on creativity and innovation?
golden_set: Yes, courses focused on creativity and innovation include the Certificate in Innovation and Critical Thinking, Creativity in Teams and Organizations, and Personal Creativity.

query: What career advancement courses are offered?
golden_set: Career advancement courses offered include Medical Scribe Career Training, HVAC Technician Online, and Comprehensive Appliance Repair Certificate.

query: Which courses help with effective communication?
golden_set: Courses that help with effective communication include Effective Presentations, Effective Public Speaking, and High Impact Communication.

query: Can you provide information about the courses related to business?
golden_set: Non-credit business courses cover topics like management, leadership, sales, marketing, and software. Some examples include The Art of Listening Persuasion and Compromise, and Certificate in Business Communications.

query: Are there any specific certifications for bartending?
golden_set: Yes, certifications for bartending include Bartending at Home-Online, and Bartending the Easy Way - Online.

query: What kind of resources are available for Human Resource Certification?
golden_set: Resources for Human Resource Certification include comprehensive courses designed to enhance HR knowledge and skills, as well as certification preparation resources.

query: What is the cost of the Certificate in Emerging Technology for Managers?
golden_set: The Certificate in Emerging Technology for Managers costs $199 and is offered by Mindedge.

query: Can you tell me about the A Manager's Guide to Artificial Intelligence course?
golden_set: The A Manager's Guide to Artificial Intelligence course costs $99 and is provided by Mindedge. It is designed to help managers understand the applications of AI in business.
